thread.title: Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years
thread.title_full: Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years

title: Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years
text: WQOW - Your Official Packers Station Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years (AP Photo/Paul Beaty). Fans gather on the streets outside of Wrigley Field after the Cubs won 6-4 in Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh). Chicago Cubs left fielder Kyle Schwarber gives high-fives to fans after the Cubs won 6-4 in Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh). Chicago Cubs center fielder Dexter Fowler (24) claps hands and smoke cigar after the Cubs won 6-4 in Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh). Chicago Cubs starting pitcher Jake Arrieta poses for selfie after the Cubs won 6-4 in Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Paul Beaty). Chicago Cubs' Kris Bryant and Anthony Rizzo celebrate after winning Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. The Cubs won 6-4.
